name: Solitaire Jackpot
description:
Play fun and classic solitaire card game on your mobile phone to win big jackpot! Use your skill and choose the perfect cards to bring you victory in every game and tournament.
If you like spider/Freecell/patience/pyramid/blackout/big run/tripeaks or 21 blitz solitaire.
– you're going to love this game! EXPLORE THIS FUN FEATURES.
- No purchase necessary to enter or win - Use undo and shuffle go through puzzle.
- Addictive & Classical Klondike game - Collect awesome daily bonuses.
- Play lucky wheel and slot machine to win big jackpot.
- Climb up leaderboard & become top solitaire player Download and play Solitaire Jackpot now!
